description: Monorepo for Project Watchtower UIs and addons.
author: HashiCorp

scripts.lint: yarn lint:addons:api && yarn lint:addons:auth && yarn lint:addons:rose && yarn lint:ui:core
scripts.lint:addons:api:
echo "

lint: addons/api
" && cd addons/api && yarn lint
scripts.lint:addons:auth:
echo "

lint: addons/auth
" && cd addons/auth && yarn lint
scripts.lint:addons:rose:
echo "

lint: addons/rose
" && cd addons/rose && yarn lint
scripts.lint:ui:core:
echo "

lint: ui/core
" && cd ui/core && yarn lint
scripts.test: yarn test:addons:api && yarn test:addons:auth && yarn test:addons:rose && yarn test:ui:core
scripts.test:addons:api:
echo "

test: addons/api
" && cd addons/api && yarn test
scripts.test:addons:auth:
echo "

test: addons/auth
" && cd addons/auth && yarn test
scripts.test:addons:rose:
echo "

test: addons/rose
" && cd addons/rose && yarn test
scripts.test:ui:core:
echo "

test: ui/core
" && cd ui/core && yarn test
scripts.precommit: yarn compliance:licenses && yarn audit && yarn lint && yarn test
